name: The Museum Guard
description:
Poject the museum from misbehaving visitors, gather thikets and distribute flyers for the best score.

Press space near a visitor that is missbehaving
Collect Ticket money presseing E near a visitor
Distribute flyers with mouse click,

end level you will win money from your performance

you will lose by letting the museum lose health by the visitors misbehaving and them leaving ripped flyers on the floor.

you can help the museum regain health by distributing flyers

Controlls:
WASD - Movement
Space - Stop Visitos Misbehaving
E - Collect Tickets
Mouse click - Send Flyers

good luck and have fun
